alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 9:55PM EST until March 11 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, with 4 to 8 inches expected in eastern Sullivan County in NY and 1 to 3 inches across parts of the Wyoming Valley in northeast PA. * WHERE...In New York, Tompkins, Tioga, Broome and Sullivan counties. In Pennsylvania, Susquehanna, Wyoming, Lackawanna and Luzerne counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates may approach a half inch late this evening into the overnight. Snow will be lighter late tonight into early Saturday before ending.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorist to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadways, and traffic conditions.
